one of the posts on the earrings bent when i went to put the backing on it
As described but the back of the earing that holds it together is cheap
love how these earrings look. wore to taylor swift concert, but very painful - dug into ear!
Wore these to work and everyone loved them!
These are such a statement earring and so fun. My students all loved them! Very chic and heavy, look more expensive than they were! Definitely keeping.

Loved these earrings for Halloween! I usually wear studs all day everyday and these were not too heavy, which was wonderful. I also have very sensitive ears and after wearing these all day, I had no issues at all. Great quality and were exactly as advertised. Bought a necklace and ring to go with as well! Highly recommend.
i really didn’t know how these were going to look because i didn’t read any reviews but i was so impressed by the quality.

评论概述: Broke the first time we tried them on!
评论详情: My daughter was so excited to get these. First off, they are really large. Much bigger than expected. That was unexpected but fine. They looked cute enough. However the first time she tried them on the entire post came off. Totally useless.
These will be great for my costume. I was worried they were going to be too heavy, but they're pretty comfortable. A little larger than I had anticipated though.

I love unusual earrings and will buy them if I am able.  The scissor earrings do look like they're cutting into the earlobe. They are lightweight and a little larger than most earrings. The back fits secure on the post. I got the silver color. I've worn them about 3 times and so far no tarnishing or peeling. Had curious stares, several people liking them and asking where I got them. My only small issue is that there are several lumpy areas on the earrings and they do show up when you look at them a short distance away. Other than that, I do like them. If this pair holds up, I may get the other colors.
Ordered these for a pumpkin-themed outfit. I am very happy with this purchase, they are very cute. I appreciate that they are lightweight and comfortable.
